product_name: The North Face Winter Warm Tights - Men's
long_description: True to their name, The North Face Winter Warm tights for men keep your legs warm and supple for cold-weather adventures. Synthetic fabric features ample stretch for comfort during cross-country skiing and winter runs. VaporWick(R) finish wicks moisture away and dries quickly, keeping you comfortable. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Calf zippers allow easy on/off over footwear. Zip back pocket secures small essentials. The North Face Winter Warm tights feature reflective highlights to keep you visible.
short_description: True to their name, The North Face Winter Warm tights for men keep your legs warm and supple for cold-weather adventures.
